text: he logo jo eemaan laaye ho! mere shatruon tatha apane shatruon ko mitr ne banao. tum sandesh bhejate ho unakee or maitree[1] ka, jabaki unhonne kufr kiya hai usaka, jo tumhaare paas saty aaya hai. ve desh nikaala dete hain rasool ko tatha tumako is kaaran ki tum eemaan laaye ho allaah, apane paalanahaar par? yadi tum nikale ho jihaad ke lie meree raah mein aur meree prasannata kee khoj ke lie, to gupt roop se unhen maitree ka sandesh bhejate ho? jabaki main bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hoon use, jo tum chhupaate ho aur jo khulakar karate ho? tatha jo karega aisa, to nishchay vah kupath ho gaya seedhee raah se
